definition:
A woman who practices unlawful sexual commerce with men, especially one who prostitutes her body for hire; a prostitute; a harlot. Wyclif. Syn. -- Harlot; courtesan; prostitute; strumpet.

1. To have unlawful sexual intercourse; to practice lewdness. 2. (Script.)  To worship false and impure gods.

To corrupt by lewd intercourse; to make a whore of; to debauch. [R.] Congreve.
